item.title: Hoverflies
item.description: Hoverflies Eupeodes corollae feeding on a mullein flower, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Meliscaeva auricollis feeding on mullein, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Scaeva pyrastri feeding on mullein, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Sphaerophoria sp., Chilterns AONB, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Toxomerus occidentalis on a thistle flower, Golden Gate NRA, USA. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss Volucella inanis on ragwort, East Grinstead, England. © 2017 Dylan Hodgkiss
